import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/GAMER/Desktop/TurboFit Project/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";//Import 
import{CURRENT_AUTH,FAIL_AUTH,LOAD_AUTH,LOGOUT_AUTH,SUCCESS_AUTH}from"../ActionType/auth.action.type";//the initial state
const initialState={isLoad:false,user:{},error:[],success:[],isAuth:false};//the pure function
const authReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let{type,payload}=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(type){case LOAD_AUTH:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoad:true});case SUCCESS_AUTH:localStorage.setItem("token",payload.token);console.log(payload);return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoad:false,user:payload.user,success:payload.success,isAuth:true});case CURRENT_AUTH:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoad:false,user:payload,isAuth:true});case FAIL_AUTH:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoad:false,errors:payload});case LOGOUT_AUTH:localStorage.removeItem("token");return{isLoad:false,user:{},error:[],success:[],isAuth:false};default:return state;}};export default authReducer;
